parameters:
\N<Segi>Maybe... this is the monster's lair that Irime-san told me
about.

\N<Segi>She said the monster is sensitive to sound... so that
means...

\N<Segi>It really appeared... This creature is the master of this
floor... Irime-san's story was true...

\N<Segi>I'm sorry for luring you out like this. But... I will defeat
you.
\N<Segi>Because I have high walls that I must overcome...!

\N<Segi>Somehow... I managed to win. I have to thank Irime-san for
all her advice...

\N<Segi>But still... what's with this creature's body? The blinding
flash of light... it almost dazzled me.

\N<Segi>I see, maybe... the same tactics could work in the battle
against Zozoye.
You have obtained the "Flash Bomb" technique manual.

The preparation status for the Training Association has been
updated. Let's open the notebook and check.
\N<Segi>Eh...? Is this a dead end... here?
